data.title: Borsao Macabeo
data.description: A flavoursome Summer wine made from the indigenous Macabeo grape in northern Spain. A balanced, modern white with flavours of ripe peach, zesty lemon and nutty undertones, it leaves the palate with a clean and fruity finish.

data.title: Love Shortie All Butter Shortbread
data.description: A rich all butter shortbread, delicately sweet and crumbly with a hint of sea salt, straight out of Scotland.

attributes.title: Allergen
attributes.value: Gluten- wheat, milk. May contain tree nuts

data.title: Domaine de L'Olibet 'Les Pujols' Cinsault Rose
data.description: A little gem from Saint Georges d’Orques in the south of France. Delicate, sweet spice aromas lead on to a palate of abundant ripe fruit, lifted by a natural zing and finishing with texture and richness. Full of character. 11.5% ABV [France]

data.title: We Are Tea A6 Notes
data.description: We Are Tea A6 Notes

data.title: Quintessential Brown Sauce (230ml) - Normally 3.25 GBP
data.description:
This is brown sauce as the gods intended. There’s something deliciously British about this curious condiment. Rich and vivid in flavour, it enhances the greatness of a full English breakfast like nothing else or try it with hot bubble and squeak.

Contains Gluten.

Ingredients
tomato puree, raw cane sugar, cider vinegar, soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, sugar, wheat flour), onions, dates, tamarind paste, garlic, chillies, sea salt, concentrated lemon juice

Nutrition Typical Values per 100g:
Energy 741kJ/174kcal, fat 0.1g of which saturates 0g, carbohydrate 40.3g, of which sugars 36.6g, fibre 1.0g protein 1.8g, salt 3.1g

data.title: Rioja Reserva, Baron de Ebro
data.description:
Intriguing notes of vanilla and chocolate make this fruity, full-bodied wine unique. With a long, pleasant finish and woody aroma supporting it, this characterful wine is a good match with beef dishes.
ABV 14%.

data.title: Bantry Bay Chenin Blanc
data.description:
South Africa have adopted the Chenin Blanc grape, and to great effect, showcased in this wine. With delicate floral notes and a subtle pineapple flavour joined by striking lemon and grapefruit notes, it pairs particularly well with seafood. 
ABC 12.5%

data.title: Dolci Colline Prosecco (200ml bottle)
data.description:
Perfect for picnics, parties, or even a long train journey, this pocket-sized prosecco is light, delicate and creamy, with apple, peach, and citrus notes.

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 11.5%

data.title: Nieto Malbec, Mendoza
data.description: This Argentinian Malbec is incredibly juicy, fresh and tasty! Forty-year-old vines yield concentrated blackberry and plum fruit flavours, with a touch of sweet spice. The palate is silky and warming, with more black fruit and cherries. A great wine with a fresh finish. 13.5% ABV [Argentina]

data.title: Charlie Bighams Cottage Pie for 2 (650g)
data.description:
Tender minced British beef, slow-cooked with red wine and thyme, topped with our creamy mashed potato, Cheddar cheese, Parmesan and breadcrumbs.

Contains: milk, wheat, egg, mustard, celery.

Ingredients: 
Potatoes, British beef (27%), water, carrots, onions, red wine, celery, cream (milk), Cheddar cheese (milk), beef stock(British beef, natural flavouring, salt, tomato purée, molasses, lemon juice concentrate,dried onions), cornflour, butter(milk), tomato puree, red wine stock (red wine concentrate, water, yeast extract, dried potatoes, salt, sugar, dried onions, sunflower oil, black pepper, thyme oil), pasteurised free-range egg yolk, rapeseed oil, garlic puree, beef gelatine, bread crumbs (wheat flour, yeast, sugar), Parmesan cheese (milk), Dijon Mustard(water, mustard seeds, vinegar, salt), parsley, salt, black pepper, rosemery, thyme.

Nutrition Typical Values per 100g:
Energy 712kJ/170kcal, fat 9.6g of which saturates 4.5g, carbohydrate 9.4g, of which sugars 0.3g, protein 11.1g, salt 0.61g

For cooking instructions see back of pack.
Consume product within use by on top of pack, alternatively freeze before use by date, eat within one month.

May contain: peanuts, nuts, sesame, celery, mustard, sulphites, wheat, eggs, milk, fish, crustaceans, soya.

data.title: Sancerre Blanc
data.description: Per 100g serving, Energy: 604kj, Energy: 144 cal, Fat: 7.5g, of which saturates: 4.5g, Carbodhydrate 13g, of which; sugars: 1.9g, protein: 6.7g, salt 0.8g. Allergens: Milk, Wheat, Fish, Mustard

data.title: Choc on Choc Make Your Own Egg Kit
data.description: It doesn't get more egg-cellent than this make your own chocolate egg kit. Allowing kids to mould and decorate their very own Easter egg with their favourite sweets. Arriving with a paper chef's hat, nothing will be more special than seeing your little ones turn into mini chocolatiers for the day!

attributes.title: Allergen
attributes.value: milk, soya. Products manufactured in a nut environment

data.title: Green & Blacks Sea Salt Dark Chocolate Thins
data.description: Infusing rich, dark chocolate with a subtle hint of Anglesey Sea Salt - nothing says 'treat yourself' like this new delight from Green & Black's. Delicately thin but deliciously crunchy, these squares of dark, organic chocolate are best broken and enjoyed alone. (Only share if you really must!)

data.title: Smooze Coconut And Mango Fruit Ice Multipack (GF) (DF)
data.description: How Smooze have created fruit ices that are this full of flavour, but low calorie, dairy free, gluten free, nut free and without preservatives or sweeteners is beyond us, but we're glad they have! Shake then freeze at home. Each box contains 5 fruit ices.

data.title: Pimm’s & Lemonade (250ml can)
data.description:
Always be ready for a summer party with this pre-prepared Pimm's Lemonade. Simply pour into a highball and serve over lots of ice with sliced strawbs and cucumber.

Ingredients
carbonated water, sugar, pimm's, london dry gin, acid: citric acid (E330), flavourings, preservative: sodium benzoate (E211)

Nutrition typical Values per 100ml:
energy 273KJ/75Kcal, carbohydrates 8.5g of which sugars 8.5g, alcohol 4.3

data.title: Espresso Martini Popcorn (70g) - Normally 2.99 GBP
data.description:
Joe & Seph's smooth Caramel infused with Coffee Liqueur and Vodka, followed by a wicked shot of Espresso. Made with 5% real spirits.

Ingredients:
Corn, sugar, butter (milk), corn syrup, double cream (milk), spirits 5% (coffee liqueur, vodka), coffee.

Made in an environment where nuts, peanuts and sesame are present.

data.title: Serious Pig Chilli & Paprika Snacking Salami
data.description: Using the finest British pork, these scrumptious salami sticks carefully balance the sharp piquancy of chilli and the smokiness of paprika to create a deep, rich flavour which won them a Great Taste Award!

data.title: Balsajo Black Garlic Cloves
data.description: What happens if you leave a premium garlic bulb in an oven for a few weeks to slow cook? You get this wonderful stuff! With a sweet, strong and balsamicky taste, it’s a seriously exciting ingredient to try out in your cooking.

data.title: Superbake Morning Dreamer Pancakes (GF) (DF)
data.description: Morning Dreamers Pancake mix is made from ancient grains, flours and baobab powder to pack even more goodness into your first meal of the day. The mix is gluten-free, wheat-free, dairy-free and can be used to make waffles. Makes 15 pancakes.

data.title: OXO Good Grips Garlic Press Black - Normally 10.49 GBP
data.description: With sturdy, die-cast zinc construction and a large capacity garlic chamber, our Garlic Press crushes garlic with a squeeze. The efficient hole pattern easily pushes garlic through, and a built-in cleaner allows for easy cleaning. Just flip the handles over to clean out excess garlic.

data.title: XXPomegranate Pleaser Cocktail Kit
data.description:
You'll fall in love with the refreshing tartness of this pomegranate molasses, gin and lemon juice concoction!
Inside this kit (for 2 cocktails): 1 unique recipe card, 1 unwaxed lemon, 100g pomegranate molasses, 100ml gordon’s gin, 150ml schweppes soda water

attributes.title: Allergen
attributes.value: For allergens, including cereals containing gluten, see ingredients in bold. Also may contain Nuts, Peanuts and Sesame.

data.title: Charlie Bighams Thai Red Curry & Fragrant Rice for 2 (835g)
data.description:
Tender chicken in our Thai red curry sauce with coconut cream, edamame beans, lime leaves and lemongrass.

Contains: fish, soya, crustaceans.

Ingredients: 
Water, coconut cream (coconut, water), chicken (19%), rice (13%), onions, bamboo shoots, edamame beans (soya), rapeseed oil, demerara sugar, lime juice, fish sauce ( anchovy extract (fish), salt, sugar), ginger purée, lime leaves, red Thai paste (dried red chilli, garlic, lemongrass, salt, shallot, galangal, shrimp paste (shrimp (crustaceans), salt)), yellow Thai paste ( lemongrass, garlic, shallot, salt, galangal, dried red chilli, coriander seeds, kaffir lime peel, cumin seeds, cardamom, ground cinnamon, mace, turmeric), red chillies* , coriander, basil, galangal, salt, garlic purée, lemon grass, cornflour, paprika oil, paprika, ground coriander, ground cumin, ground fennel seeds, ground white pepper, ground cardamom, ground star anise.

*As you would expect, this has a bit of a kick.

Nutrition Typical Values per 100g:
Energy 604kJ/145kcal, fat 7.3g of which saturates 4.5g, carbohydrate 13.6g, of which sugars 2.1g, protein 6.7g, salt 0.64g

For cooking instructions see back of pack.
Consume product within use by on top of pack, alternatively freeze before use by date, eat within one month.

May contain: peanuts, nuts, sesame, celery, mustard, sulphites, wheat, eggs, milk, fish, crustaceans, soya.

data.title: Terra Vega Reserva, Merlot
data.description:
This Chilean Merlot Reserva from the Colchagua Valley is made by Terra Vega, winners of Best Chilean Wine Producer in the International Wine & Spirit Competition in 2012. Its taste has a touch of oak, with delicate herb & cherry aromas, perfect with our Halloumi, Lemon & Courgette Kebabs.
14% ABV

data.title: Alara Organic Very Berry Museli
data.description: Muesli inspired by summer: crispy and chewy, very fruity and sweet with wonderful fragrance of abundant strawberries. Whole grains, sunflower seeds and fruits provide healthy balanced nutrition. Very tasty! 600g

data.title: Please ignore
data.description: Nicola Spring Porcelain Spoon Rest

data.title: Brewdog Nanny State (Alcohol Free) Pale Ale
data.description: Brewing a full flavoured craft beer at 0.5% is no easy task. Packed with loads of Centennial, Amarillo, Columbus, Cascade and Simcoe hops, dry hopped to the brink. With a backbone of 8 different speciality malts, Nanny State will tantalise your taste buds and leave you wanting more. ABV 0.5%

data.title: BKD Chocolate Dino Mini Baking Kit
data.description: Fuel kids’ imaginations. Make baking with your family easy, tasty & super fun! Chocolate Dino Biscuits Mini Baking Kit comes with everything you will need to create 10-12 of your very own biscuits, they even include a cookie cutter and edible decorations!

data.title: Salt & Black Pepper Cashews
data.description: Deliciously moreish, these cashews are coated in a salt and spicy black pepper seasoning for a real kick of flavour. Don't expect them to last long as a party snack - they'll be gone in seconds!

attributes.title: Allergen
attributes.value: nuts. Not suitable for nut, peanut, or sesame allergy sufferers

data.title: Green & Blacks Dark 70% Chocolate
data.description: You know the drill: Green & Blacks make classic British chocolate. Three simple ingredients - organic, Fairtrade Trinitario cocoa beans, sugar and vanilla - create a taste that’s simply divine.

data.title: Serious Pig Snackingham Classic
data.description: It's not a village in Hampshire, it's a snack revelation! Finest British pork is infused with caraway, fennel, coriander and black pepper, cured and air-dried before being sliced into a seriously tasty, bite-sized snack. High in protein and low in fat.

data.title: Adnams Dry Hopped Lager
data.description:
Bold, bright and tasty, this multi-award winning beer is the first lager from the classic British Adnams Southwold brewery. It's made with pilsner malt and dry hopped with Galaxy hops from Oz, golden & light tropical fruits and hop flavours. 
ABV 4.2% 
330ML

data.title: Sierra Grande Pinot Noir (750ml bottle)
data.description:
If you usually say no to a heavy Bordeaux, a Pinot Noir might be just the ticket. With subtle smoky notes rounded out with ripe and juicy berries, this red pairs perfectly with oriental duck or a fragrant middle eastern lamb dinner.

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 13%

data.title: Joseph Joseph Duo-Blade
data.description: These spring-hinged scissors double are safe, intuitive and fold away tidily for easy storage. They also double up as box cutters, perfect for getting into your Gousto box and snipping open any packaged ingredients inside!

data.title: OGB Citra IPA (330ml can)
data.description:
For over 250 years the legendary Guinness brewers have been passionate about crafting flavourful beers, including this IPA which blends US West Coast citrus with a refreshing finish straight from Ireland.

Ingredients
water, malted barley, roast barley, hops.

Nutrition typical Values per 100ml:
energy 173KJ/41.7Kcal, total fat <0.1g, of which saturates <0.1g, carbohydrate 3.0g, of which sugars <0.4g, protein 0.5g, sodium <0.01g, salt <0.01g, ABV 5%.

data.title: Original Onion Marmalade (345g)
data.description:
This was the UK's first onion marmalade, and rather special it is too. Made with a splish of redcurrant juice for a pleasing tang, it’s excellent with pâtés, terrines and cheeses, and incomparable when melted over sausages.

Ingredients
onions, raw cane sugar, citrus pectin, spiced vinegar (cider vinegar, cinnamon, cloves, ginger), concentrated redcurrant juice, extra virgin olive oil, concentrated lemon juice

Nutrition Typical Values per 100g:
Energy 1193kJ/282kcal, fat 1.2g of which saturates 0.2g, carbohydrate 65.6g, of which sugars 64.2g, fibre 1.7g, protein 0.8g, salt 0.12g

data.title: Trio of Chocolate Popcorn Joe & Sephs (80g)
data.description: For popcorn and chocolate lovers alike, Joe & Seph's have combined their signature gourmet popcorn with a tasty mix of White Chocolate, Milk Chocolate and Cookies & Cream. This popcorn is air-popped rather than fried.

data.title: Lemon & Cardamom (85g)
data.description:
Looking for a chocolate escape? With every bite of this globetrotting chocolate, you'll discover why the sweet citrus of Italian lemon pairs so sensationally with the spice of Sri Lankan cardamom.

Ingredients
cocoa mass, sugar, cocoa butter, cardamom oil, vanilla, lemon oil.

Nutrition typical Values per 100g:
Energy 2,341KJ/563Kcal, fat 38g of which saturates 23g, carbohydrates 45g  of which sugars 43g, dietary fibre 8g, protein 6g, salt 0.08g.

May contain: peanut, soy, milk, nut. Produced on a site that handles peanuts, soy, milk and nuts.

data.title: Deep Roast Creamy Peanut Butter - Gift
La Lisse Soie d'Ivoire Chenin Blanc
data.description: This wine is fantastically food friendly. La Lisse Soie d'Ivoire translates as 'soft ivory silk', which gives a clue to the attractive texture of this sensual Chenin Blanc. Hints of caramel and brioche lead lead to a densely fruity peach palate. A clean, lifted finish. 12.5% ABV [France]

data.title: The Cloud Factory Sauvignon Blanc, Marlborough
data.description: New Zealand's Marlborough region has created this classically bright and vibrant Sauvignon Blanc. Flavours of guava, lime and tropical fruits combine to create a modern, clean white that best complements shellfish and vegetarian dishes.

data.title: Camino Real Blanco Rioja
data.description: This white Rioja goes particularly well with mildly spiced dishes, and will be great with chicken and fish recipes such as our Light Citrus Chicken. Notes of date and banana make it a flavoursome, interesting wine with just the right amount of complexity. ABV 12.5%

data.title: Zingiberry Cocktail Kit
data.description:
Named after 'zingiber' (ginger's Latin name), redcurrant jelly, lime and vodka are mixed with ginger ale in this fun, fancy zinger.
Inside the kit (for 2 cocktails): 1 unique recipe card, 1 lime, 30g dried cranberries, 50g rich redcurrant jelly, 100ml smirnoff vodka, 150ml schweppes ginger ale

data.title: Festive GT flyer
data.description: Festive GT flyer

data.title: Hippeas - In Herbs We Trust (22g) - Snack Pack
data.description:
Hippeas organic chickpea puffs with rosemary, oregano and thyme are packing serious herbaceous flavour. High in fibre and a source of protein, they're light, crunchy and a deliciously reliable snack.

Ingredients:
Chickpeas, Quinoa, Tapioca, sunflower oil, Mediterranean Flavour Seasoning, Rice Flour, Unrefined Cane Sugar, Smoked Sea Salt, Sea Salt, Onions, Natural Flavouring, Anti-Caking Agent: Calcium Carbonate, Rice Protein

Nutrition Typical Values per 100g:
Energy 1707kJ/408kcal, fat 16.9g of which saturates 2g, carbohydrate 49.5g, of which sugars 4.2g, fibre 7.9g, protein 14.3g, salt 1.2g.

May contain: sulphites, milk, soya, gluten containing cereals, wheat.

data.title: Belleville Brewing Co. Picnic Pale
data.description: Eight different hops combine to give this easy-drinking IPA its citrusy-piney blast of aroma and palate-tingling bitterness. True to its name, this is a perfect picnic beer (but we reckon it's just as nice when enjoyed at home).

data.title: Seedlip - Garden (200ml)
data.description:
With a fragrant blend of garden herbs, sweet hand-picked peas & homegrown hay, this non-alcoholic showcase of British countryside is fresh, floral, and best served with tonic and a sugar snap pea garnish.

Ingredients: 
Water, Natural Botanical Distillates and Extracts (15%), Preservative: Potassium Sorbate, Acid: Citric acid. Botanicals: Peas, Hay, Spearmint, Rosemary, Thyme, Hops

Nutrition Typical Values per 100g:
Energy 0kJ/0kcal, fat 0g of which saturates 0g, carbohydrate 0g, of which sugars 0g, protein 0g, salt 0g.

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): <0.5%

May contain: sulphites, milk, soya

data.title: Manilife Original Peanut Butter (295g)
data.description: An award winning lightly roasted single estate peanut butter with the perfect combination of creaminess and crunch. These beauties are naturally sweeter than your average nut and with fat profile more akin to olive oil, better for you too. Allergen: Peanut

data.title: Mighty Fine Honeycomb Salted Caramel Dips
data.description: It doesn’t get more irresistible than this signature light & crisp honeycomb. Flavoured with sea salt & wrapped in caramel-infused Belgian milk chocolate – it’s a treat which makes a real difference – with money from each pack sold going to the Friends of the Honey Bee campaign.

data.title: Slabb Bar- The Millionaires One
data.description: Filled with smooth caramel and crunchy biscuit pieces, the Millionaire's bar is full of luxury goodness. The 70% Belgian chocolate bar drizzled with quality white chocolate is the perfect finish to the perfect Easter.
